list.abs: type genus of the family Holocentridae ; squirrelfishes ., 鳂科的一个模式属 ; 金鳞鱼.

means.word_mean: 1. similar to sea bream; small spiny-finned fish found in bays along the southeastern coast of the United States
2. very small brightly colored (especially red) nocturnal fishes of shallow waters of tropical reefs; they make sounds like a squirrel's bark
